duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform environmental projects including office-based and field activities.
Conduct site inspections and assessments; oversee soil boring and monitor well installations.
Collect groundwater, soil, and surface water samples for laboratory analyses.
Assist with groundwater investigations and comparison of soil and groundwater data to State regulatory standards.
Prepare reports and data tables; graphical presentation of data.
Work in the field in all weather conditions and engage in physically demanding tasks.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Science disciplines from an accredited college or university.
